Brunei Wiki Sources
Hey there! This was a mini-project of mine from 2017. As you may expect, a lot of the info and links here will be outdated. I've kept the site up for archival purposes.

Brunei Wiki Sources - Applications & Documents from the Government

Applications & Documents from the Government

This is a very broad category, I know, but this kind of stuff tends to be found all over the place, which I really don’t care to re-host.

Check out these resources:

  • e-darussalam (Bahasa Melayu & English) / brunei.gov.bn - Official government resources
  • Concierge of Brunei - Resources compiled by individuals

Types of applications/documents to expect in the above sites:

  • Personal documents: IC, Passport, Driving License
  • Labour: Domestic Worker (maid/amah) Applications, Foreign Recruitment, TAP/SCP
  • Religious: Haj, Marriage, Halal Permit

Also: Culture, Health, Housing, Social/Family Services, Transport
